yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.acetic_a: A bottle of acetic anhydride, made by combining oxygen and sugar.
A bottle of ammonia, made by heating up nitrogen.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.crystal_: A fine crystal methamphetamine made from iodine, red phosphorus, pseudoephedrine, and water.
A deadly poison extracted from bamboo.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.hydrogen: A bottle of hydrogen, made by mixing the pharmaceutic potion and a netherite ingot.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.methylam: A bottle of methylamine, made by mixing nitrogen, an amethyst shard, and methynol.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.methynol: A bottle of methynol, made by mixing hydrogen, a netherite ingot, and charcoal.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.nitrogen: A bottle of nitrogen, made by combining 3 potatoes and an empty bottle.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.oxygen.d: A bottle of oxygen, made by mixing the pharmaceutic potion and a copper ingot.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.pharmace: A potion made by mixing water & golden carrots.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.phenylac: A bottle of phenylacetic acid, made by mixing cyanide and the pharmaceutic potion.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.phrnylac: A bottle of phenylacetone, made by mixing acetic anhydride and phenylacetic acid.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.pure_cry: The purest of crystal methamphetamine, made from phenylacetone  & methylamine.
yapping_tooltips.item.bbsquared.pure_pow: Pure crystal meth crushed up into a fine powder.
